remarks: Existence of a class abstraction with an existentially quantified expression.  Both ` x ` and ` y ` can be free in ` ph ` .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jul-2006.)
statement:
abrexex2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
abrexex2.2 $e |- { y | ph } e. _V $.
abexssex $p |- { y | E. x ( x C_ A /\ ph ) } e. _V $.
$d A x y $.
